items.content_html: Suiteproxy is a lightweight proxy server designed to securely relay API requests to a NetSuite RESTlet URL. By acting as an intermediary, it protects your NetSuite account credentials and ensures enhanced control, including customizable rate limiting features, IP restrictions, and additional security measures.
items.title: budysutjijati/suiteproxy: Suiteproxy is a lightweight proxy server designed to securely relay API requests to a NetSuite RESTlet URL. By acting as an intermediary, it protects your NetSuite account credentials and ensures enhanced control, including customizable rate limiting features, IP restrictions, and additional security measures.

items.content_html: vue3-lazy-image-loader is a lightweight plugin for Vue 3 that simplifies lazy loading of images using the modern Intersection Observer API. With customizable options, it enhances performance by deferring image loading until they appear in the viewport.
items.title: abanoub2017/vue3-lazy-image-loader: vue3-lazy-image-loader is a lightweight plugin for Vue 3 that simplifies lazy loading of images using the modern Intersection Observer API. With customizable options, it enhances performance by deferring image loading until they appear in the viewport.

items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
